message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for sale. It's worth $100 to you, and we're willing to let it go for $95. Don't miss out on this great opportunity!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $85. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
Thank you for your response, Bob. We understand your position and would like to counter with an offer of $90 for the product. We believe this is a fair compromise.
I appreciate your counteroffer, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $87.50?

We appreciate your continued interest in our product, Bob. After careful consideration, we've decided to lower our asking price to $89. This is our final offer, as we also have another interested buyer ready to purchase at $80.
I understand you have another interested buyer, but I'm still willing to make a serious offer. I'll meet you halfway between our last offers at $88. Can you consider this?
